intro: On the 4th day of the same month, we commemorate the Holy Great Martyr Barbara.

who: Our Holy Father John, Monk and Presbyter, the Damascene
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy father John, monk and presbyter, the Damascene.

who: Our Holy Father John, Bishop of Polyboton, the Wonderworker
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy father John, Bishop of Polyboton, the Wonderworker.
On the same day the Holy Martyr Juliana was perfected by the sword.
On the same day Saints Christodoulos and Christodoule were perfected by the sword.

who: The Holy New Hieromartyr Seraphim of Phanari, Bishop
intro: On the same day the Holy New Hieromartyr Seraphim of Phanari, a bishop who suffered martyrdom in the year 1601 by impalement, was perfected.
